question: The common international poverty line is based on an income of around___?
option1: $1.00 per day at the 2004 purchasing power parity
option2: $1.25 per day at the 2005 purchasing power parity
option3: $1.25 per day at the 2007 purchasing power parity
option4: $1.25 per day at the 2008 purchasing power parity
answer: $1.25 per day at the 2005 purchasing power parity
